thread.title: Great stay in a great city
thread.title_full: Great stay in a great city - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joe C
title: Great stay in a great city
text:
Hotel staff was very helpful. Asked for an early check in and it was available. Porter was helpful and timely with the luggage. Maid service was good. Checkout was easy. Would recommend the Dumont to anyone. Liked it so much that I am returning March 24 for 3 nights with 8 friends and expect the same good service.
Room Tip: One bedroom suite See more room tips
